metadata.title: CVE-2020-27225 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In versions 4.18 and earlier of the Eclipse Platform, the Help Subsystemdoes not authenticate active help requests to the local help web server,allowing an unauthenticated local attacker to issue active help commands tothe associated Eclipse Platform process or Eclipse Rich Client Platformprocess.

criterions.comment: eclipse: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
